upgrade:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "breweries" (
    "id" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "name" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "brewery_type" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "street" TEXT,
    "address_2" TEXT,
    "address_3" TEXT,
    "city" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "state" TEXT,
    "county_province" TEXT,
    "postal_code" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "website_url" TEXT,
    "phone" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "created_at" TIMESTAMP,
    "updated_at" TIMESTAMP,
    "country" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "longitude" DECIMAL(35,30),
    "latitude" DECIMAL(35,30),
    "tags" BOOL,
    "idx" SERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY
);
COMMENT ON TABLE "breweries" IS 'OpenBreweryDB table for Tortoise consumption.';
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "aerich" (
    "id" SERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    "version" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    "app" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    "content" TEXT NOT NULL
);
